heading: Let's get started
body: Are you seeking information for yourself or for someone else?

heading: Let's see what we can do for you.
body: In what country do you have citizenship?

heading: Your were born in the United States.
You were born in Mexico.
body: Have any deportation proceedings (including arrest) been initiated against you?

heading: Sorry.
body: This app is only designed to help people with Mexican citizenship right now.

heading: We're here to help.
body: Do you have any children currently living in the United States?

heading: Alright, just a few more questions.
body: In the event of your deportation, would you like your child/children to continue living in the Unites States or to move to Mexico with you?

heading: You do not have any children in the United States.
body: Do you have any children currently living in Mexico?
